Package de.unisiegen.tpml.core.prettyprinter

Interface Summary
PrettyCharIterator Provides functionality to iterate over the characters contained within an PrettyString and extract certain information about the style and annotations for a given character.
PrettyPrintable Base interface for classes whose instances can be pretty printed.
PrettyString Provides the functionality to pretty-print a PrettyPrintable as string while extracting several informations about the printables contained within the pretty string.
PrettyStringBuilder Base interface to pretty string builders, that can be generated by the factory class PrettyStringBuilderFactory.
 

Class Summary
AbstractItem Abstract base class for items in the DefaultPrettyStringBuilder, which are used to collect the information while generating the pretty string content.
BreakItem This class represents breaks that can be inserted into the item list of a pretty string builder using the PrettyStringBuilder.addBreak() method and indicate that the presenter may start a new line at this offset.
BuilderItem This class represents a pretty string builder that is added to another pretty string builder.
DefaultPrettyCharIterator Default implementation of the PrettyCharIterator interface, which operates on data provided by the PrettyString class.
DefaultPrettyString Default implementation of the PrettyString interface.
DefaultPrettyStringBuilder Default implementation of the PrettyStringBuilder interface, which is the heart of the pretty printer.
PrettyAnnotation An annotation for the pretty printer.
PrettyStringBuilderFactory Factory class for PrettyStringBuilders.
TextItem This class represents a chunk of text in DefaultPrettyStringBuilders item list, which is associated with a given PrettyStyle.
 

Enum Summary
PrettyStyle Possible styles for items in a PrettyString.
